---

```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
raw <- read_csv("polls_IT-parliament_2018-10-01.csv")
```

Purpose of this document is to show polling results in Italy.
```{r, first plot, message = FALSE}
#just shows LN vote overtime 
ggplot(raw, aes(y = LN, x = date, color = "red")) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_point(aes(x = date, y = M5S, color = "blue"))
  
tidy_data <- raw %>%
  gather(key = "party", value = "rating", FIPDLFI:Ncl)
```
